name: Distribution
description: Returns a TSV file with the number of contracts for each city and for each date in the interval.

Parameter.description: Last included date in the output, if not specified just fromdate is considered

name: Distribution
description: Returns a TSV file with the number of members for each city and for each date in the interval.

Parameter.description: Last included date in the output, if not specified just fromdate is considered
